name: James "Buster" Douglas Knock Out Boxing
overview: You're a contendah! James "Buster" Douglas Boxing throws you into the ring with the meanest power-punchers around. Pummel your way to the title in a game designed with all the toughness of James "Buster" Douglas, the Columbus, Ohio boxer who beat Mike Tyson! Slug and jab with devastating real-life accuracy. Dodge, block and crouch! Slam your opponent to the canvas with vicious uppercuts, or flatten him on the ropes with a storm of straight shots and hooks. Be one of five boxers, including Heavyweight Title Holder "Buster" Douglas. Each bruiser challenges the ring with a different murderous style. Battle Dynamite Joe and slugger Gomez. Trade furious fists with Kim Nang and King Jason. Win the title, then defend it when opponents return madder and meaner! Then, as uncontested champ, match your mettle in the toughest challenge of a boxing career. The slugfest begins!
